v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the payment made by order, in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора
Suma achitării efectuate conform comenzii în valuta contractului

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS PastPerformance, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OverduePayment, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ForToday, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderOfThe, CASE WHEN RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ForShipment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS ForPayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref, DocumentCustomerOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentCustomerOrder.Number, DocumentCustomerOrder.Date, DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted, DocumentCustomerOrder.Author, DocumentCustomerOrder.BankAccount, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType, DocumentCustomerOrder.JobKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.PricesKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.ShippingDate, DocumentCustomerOrder.Contract, DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed, DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.PettyCash, DocumentCustomerOrder.Comment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentCustomerOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentCustomerOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentCustomerOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentCustomerOrder.Entity, DocumentCustomerOrder.Responsible, DocumentCustomerOrder.Project, DocumentCustomerOrder.Event, DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder, DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus AS StatusOfOrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentCustomerOrder.Start, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitSales, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentCustomerOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentCustomerOrder.CashType, DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish, DocumentCustomerOrder.Cell, DocumentCustomerOrder.PointInTime, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0)) * 100 / DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.CustomerOrder AS DocumentCustomerOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS RunSchedule ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.GoodsOrder AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.FactOfPaymentOrders AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment

v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the payment made by order, in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора
Suma achitării efectuate conform comenzii în valuta contractului

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish < &CurrentDateTimeSession AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS PastPerformance, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OverduePayment, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND (DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType = VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Start <= &CurrentDateSession AND DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish >= &CurrentDateTimeSession OR DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType <> VALUE(Enum.TransactionTypesCustomerOrder.WorkOrder) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession) THEN TRUE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ForToday, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed AND DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderOfThe, CASE WHEN RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ForShipment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS ForPayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref, DocumentCustomerOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentCustomerOrder.Number, DocumentCustomerOrder.Date, DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted, DocumentCustomerOrder.Author, DocumentCustomerOrder.BankAccount, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType, DocumentCustomerOrder.JobKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.PricesKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.ShippingDate, DocumentCustomerOrder.Contract, DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed, DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.PettyCash, DocumentCustomerOrder.Comment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentCustomerOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentCustomerOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentCustomerOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentCustomerOrder.Entity, DocumentCustomerOrder.Responsible, DocumentCustomerOrder.Project, DocumentCustomerOrder.Event, DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder, DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus AS StatusOfOrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentCustomerOrder.Start, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitSales, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentCustomerOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentCustomerOrder.CashType, DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish, DocumentCustomerOrder.Cell, DocumentCustomerOrder.PointInTime, CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted AND DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0)) * 100 / DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.CustomerOrder AS DocumentCustomerOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS RunSchedule ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.GoodsOrder AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.FactOfPaymentOrders AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment
